author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Inayam Commercial Port Opposition Movement postponed its hunger strike planned at Pudukkadai junction on Saturday to February 29, said N. George Robinson of the movement.

Mr. George Robinson said the movement opposed the move of the union government to establish Colechal Commercial Port in Inayam area, as it would affect the livelihood of people from all walks of life – fishermen, farmers and a number of habitations.

The government should withdraw the project and to press this demand, the movement would gather people from Arokyapuram to Neerodi and stage a mega agitation in front of the Collectorate on February 29.
title: Fast postponed
